alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:56PM CDT until August 07 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL THOMAS COUNTY... At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Colby, moving southeast at 30 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR CENTRAL THOMAS COUNTY. HAZARD...Three inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Spotter have reported hail up to 3 and a half inches. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Colby, Gem, Mingo and Halford. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 48 and 63. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...3.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
